$WmMPID_炎部族リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_FireFes22,Face|Some plains tribes where I grew up
have their own festival competitions
that are similar to this...$k$pI have some fond memories
of those days!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_FireFes22,Face|Festivals are fun. Mordecai will
try hard!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_FireFes22,Face|Gyah-ha-hahaaahhh! The flame
within burns hotter than ever!
Who will be turned to ash first?!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_炎部族リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_FireFes22,Face|Urgh... It's been a while since my
last festival like this. Rest assured,
I will do better next time!$k$p$Sbs150|
